name: Hồ Xuân Hương Morning Run
highlight: Arrive before sunrise to see the lake mist — absolutely magical. Grab bánh mì right after at the stalls on Trần Phú street.

name: Vườn Hoa — Flower Garden
highlight: Mimosa flowers bloom Feb–Mar — perfect if you're visiting during Tết season. Golden hour photography is incredible here.

name: Langbiang Mountain Trail
highlight: Hire a CP12 local guide — they know unmarked shortcuts and the best viewpoint for sunrise photography at 2,169m.

name: Chợ Đêm — Night Market
highlight: Try the hồng (persimmon) wine and bánh tráng nướng — Dalat street food staples you won't find anywhere else.

name: Tự Liêm Loop — Hill Intervals
highlight: Ask your CP12 host for the hand-drawn route map — the shortcut through the strawberry farms adds 2km of pure joy.

name: Trúc Lâm Zen Monastery
highlight: The return forest hike is 3km of pine-shaded trail — runners can jog it back in 20 mins for a beautiful cooldown.
